channel.title: Apps on TrozWare
channel.description: Recent content in Apps on TrozWare

item.title: Retiring old apps
item.description: With the release of iOS 10 and the need to update iOS apps to suit, I have decided it is time to retire some of my lesser-performing apps as it is not worth the effort required to maintain them. At the moment, the following iOS apps are no longer available: A Knight’s Move Dice Pass Pic-a-POD Quick Score - Tennis For the first three listed there, the Mac versions are still available:
